attributes.action: Open up GP surgeries bring back face to face appointments
attributes.additional_details: people are dying Because they are not getting face to face consultations
attributes.background: If pubs , hairdressers etc can open then GP’s Should open up to the public

rejection.details:
Government guidance allows for GPs to see patients face-to-face if necessary: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/social-distancing/using-the-nhs-and-other-health-services/.

Whether a GP invites patients to attend an appointment in person is a clinical decision for them, their surgery, and the Clinical Commissioning Group to which they belong, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for more GP surgeries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548999
